directions: Stir ketchup, tomato-vegetable juice cocktail, molasses, Meyer lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, onion, garlic, and black pepper together in a bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate to let the flavors blend, at least 45 minutes.
ingredients: 6 fluid ounces tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8®), or more to taste
title: Basic Barbeque Sauce
